          <title>
            <string language="sl">Je trk elastičen ali  neelastičen?</string>
            <string language="en">Is the collision elastic or inelastic?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist der Zusammenstoß elastisch oder unelastisch?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La collision est-elle élastique ou non 
élastique ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É a colisão elástica ou inelastic?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È lo scontro elastico o anelastico?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι η σύγκρουση ελαστική ή ανελαστική;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Es la colisión elástico o inelástica?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zgodi se trk med dvema hokejskima ploščkoma na podlagi brez trenja.</string>
            <string language="en">Two hockey pucks collide on a surface without friction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trk</string>
            <string language="en">collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ohranitveni zakon</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibalna količina</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Hockeykobolde stoßen auf eine Oberfläche ohne 
Friktion zusammen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux galets d'hockey se heurtent sur une surface sans 
frottement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois pucks do hockey colidem em uma superfície sem 
fricção.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due dischi di gomma del hockey si scontrano su una 
superficie senza attrito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο σφαίρες χόκευ! συγκρούονται σε μια επιφάνεια 
χωρίς τριβή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos duendes maliciosos del hockey chocan en una superficie
sin la fricción.</string>
          </description>
